page.title: 16Hillside Nurseries(Hastings)
page.content: {Hillside Nurseries}occupy one acre of sloping field bought in 1957.Up until 1985 they dealt with { bedding plants}and{pot plants}but they have now gone entirely over to{ {cut flowers.}They own eight glass houses heated by oil.The owner works six days a week for most of the year from{8.00am to 4.30pm}in{ {January}and{February}and{8.00am to {6.00pm}for the rest of the year.He employs one man full time,one woman 6 mornings a week in summer only.He sells mostly to local florists and greengrocers,but is now having to send more to{London}as local demand has decreased with loss of jobs and consequent shortage of money.
